abstract: The world’s largest oil company empowered everyone, even contractors, to speak up about safety problems after the environmental disaster in Prince William Sound.
snippet: The world’s largest oil company empowered everyone, even contractors, to speak up about safety problems after the environmental disaster in Prince William Sound.
lead_paragraph: Before the Deepwater Horizon accident, the embodiment of a disastrous oil spill was the 1989 grounding of the Exxon Valdez in Prince William Sound off the coast of Alaska.

headline.main: New Culture of Caution at Exxon After Valdez
headline.print_headline: After Exxon Valdez, a New Culture of Caution in the Company
